user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
    o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level.
    o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
    o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
    o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
    o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the most appropriate datafile attribute from the available PLEXOS datafiles.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate data file for modification.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the DHEM model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the most appropriate scenario object for creation within the model.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories of the gas pipeline class, using the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate properties for objects within the specified categories.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the model to clone and apply the new scenario.
